title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 353-1.1 - Purpose and applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 353-1.1 - Purpose and applicability

State Regulations
(a) Purpose. The purpose of this Part is to implement Title 30 of

Article 27 of the Environmental Conservation Law. This Part sets forth the
requirements for a prohibition on expanded polystyrene foam containers and
expanded polystyrene loose fill packaging. (b) Applicability. This Part applies to any covered food service provider or
store, that sells, offers for sale, or distributes expanded polystyrene foam
containers in New York State, and any manufacturer or store that sells, offers
for sale, or distributes expanded polystyrene loose fill packaging in New York

State. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
353-1.1

Adopted

New

York State Register March 30, 2022/Volume XLIV, Issue 13, eff. 4/14/2022

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
